resources.string: This section requires SystemUI restart\nTap on menu to restart.
Let\'s customize everything to our likings.
Ditch the stock UI monotony – personalize every tech detail to match your style and preferences.
Compatible with all OOS-based ROMs, ensuring broad support for Android devices.
It is time for Oxygen Customizer to do some internal work.
Starting internal tasks, marking the initiation of essential work. Ready to begin?
Storage permission is required to build the necessary files.
Could Not Find Compatible Root Method
Use any popular root solutions to proceed.
Looks like your device is not rooted!
Reboot your device to put all files in place.
Logs have been saved in documents folder.
Installation skipped. Some features may not function properly.
App will close now. You can open it again by tapping on the new icon
A system reboot is required for the settings to apply
Requires a SystemUI restart to apply
Are you sure you want to restart all scoped processes except the system framework?\nUse this if the module isn\'t working!\nMake sure all the relevant scopes are checked!
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide clock if launcher is visible
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock

In addition to the normal text, dynamic variables are also available, like Date and Temperature:

$G\<format\> : Gregorian date, based on format*
$P\<format\> : Persian date, based on format*
$T\<format\>[interval] : Temperature; 
format can be b (for battery), c (for CPU), g (for GPU) and s (for skin) 
Lastly, there is OPTIONAL number of update interval in seconds (default: 60 seconds)

*for format documentation, search for "Java Date Format"
Status bar Left and Right Padding
Setting the values to min/max is equivalent to device Default
Set both to 0 to disable level-based colors
Change charging icon to custom icon
Keep only charging icon and percentage
Change charging icon to custom icon
Show different color based on battery level
Blend battery color with custom color
Change color of fast charging battery
Show percentage on the opposite side
Move percentage to inside battery icon
Hide Bluetooth icon when not connected.
Disable/Enable Mobile data to show changes.
Force to show My Devices in Control Center.\nNOTE: You need new Control Center and My Devices to be installed to properly use this feature.
Display QS header image in landscape mode
Image is stretched to fit by default
Enabling and disabling Custom Clock needs SystemUI restart.\nTap on menu to restart.
Add a custom clock on QS panel
Pick a style of your choice.
Pick your font.\nDo not select file from Recent.
Custom color instead of primary color
Launcher Options requires Launcher Restart.\nTap on menu to restart.
Tap on the app icon to open app details in Settings.
BETA FEATURE: Force themed icons for all apps.\nRe-enable themed icons in launcher to apply.
Both command for left and right side
Long press volume buttons to toggle torch
Control music playback with volume buttons
Replace carrier name on lockscreen.\nKeep blank to disable
Hide power menu on secure lockscreen
Hide bottom SOS button in lockscreen
Pick your custom icon.\nThe recommended image resolution is around 216 x 216.
Dynamically integrate wallpaper\'s foreground with the clock
AI model is downloaded on the device
AI model isn\'t available on the device (yet)
Display media cover art when available
Display media cover art as Tile background when available

Use a suitable lockscreen wallpaper where the foreground elements do not obstruct the entire clock on your lock screen, ensuring both visual appeal and functional clarity on your lock screen.
After enabling, set a Lockscreen Wallpaper, the AI model will automatically try to extract the Subject from the Wallpaper.

Note: %s.
Pick a style of your choice.
Pick your font.\nDo not select file from Recent.
Custom color instead of primary color
Pick a style of your choice.
Pick your font.\nDo not select file from Recent.
Custom color instead of primary color
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device.\nEnabling Pulse on Ambient and/or NavBar can increase power consumption.
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Show a prominent Wave when the amplitude is bigger
Rotate the waveform in Lockscreen/Ambient Display
Set the visualizer in center mirrored mode
Create other pulse and flip vertically
Customize Fluid Music apps.\nThis list will replace System\'s Fluid Music App List.
Control the granularity of each stream
Automatically pauses media when the volume is muted and will resume automatically when volume is restored within the set time.
Add advanced reboot options to power menu.
Require authentication to use advanced reboot options.
If enabled, the USB dialog will be hidden and MTP option will be chosen automatically.

Explanation

 Package responsive means that everything works fine,

 Package disabled because bootloops means that there are errors in hooking, so the package is disabled from hooking. Get in touch with the dev to solve.

 Package not responding means that the app probably isn't enabled in LSPosed or is closed, try to launch the app and check if package is responsive.
Downloading - Please tap on the notification once completed
Authenticate to show advanced reboot options
Help us to translate Oxygen Customizer into your language
This channel shows notification about the latest updates.
A new version of Oxygen Customizer is available
Thanking those who made this possible.
Network geolocation is disabled.\n\nSet a custom location or enable network location
Check for new versions once in a while
Check for updates in background only when connected to wifi
Move weather view to center horizontally
Location permissions are required to fetch weather data. Click OK to open Settings.
Reboot your phone to use the latest added features and options.\nTap here to reboot now.
Set custom style for your interface
Notification Preview.\nClick to apply this style.
Set custom corner radius for notifications.
Set custom style for USB dialog.
Allow customizing dark mode app list.
Show device info widget on lockscreen
Set custom device name.\nKeep blank to disable.
Fix lag when opening app from recents
Force all apps to use the fix.\nWarning: this could cause weird issues, use at your own risk!
Select to which app apply the fix
Your OOS Version could not be compatible with this fix.\nIf you want, you can still force the fix.
